Class UDPConnection

java.lang.Object
  com.jme3.network.connection.Connection
      com.jme3.network.connection.UDPConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class UDPConnection
extends Connection

The UDPConnection handles all UDP traffic.
